intro.title: Question
intro.description: How might we increase the convenience of finding out the songs we heard in the movies/dramas?

obstacle.title: Current Search Process & Obstacles
obstacle.description: We often use the apps like SoundHound or Shazam to find out the songs upon hearing them. However, we still have to memorize the lyrics and submit them to the search engine most of the time. For example, you went to the movies.
obstacle.conclusion: Talking of the detail of movies/dramas, IMDB is the first stop. But it is hard to find by the lyrics because only song names are mentioned. Therefore, you are probably unsure if it is the song you heard in the movies/dramas.
